text: Pan European Game Information (PEGI) is a European self-regulatory organization that assigns age and content ratings to consumer video games. The PEGI system is used in more than thirty countries. PEGI has rated more than 15,000 video games from 2003 to 2010. == Ratings == Mark Rating 3 years old 7 years old 12 years old 16 years old 18 years old == History == Legend 3 7 12 16 18 Before 2009 2009-2010 After 2010 == References == Category:2003 establishments in Europe Category:Censorship Category:Cultural organizations Category:European organizations Category:Video game content rating systems
title: PEGI
